instructions.name: createProposal
docs: This may be called by anyone, since the [Proposal] does not do anything until

accounts.name: proposer
docs: One of the owners. Checked in the handler via [SmartWallet::owner_index].

instructions.name: activateProposal
docs: Only the [Governor::voter] may call this; that program
may ensure that only certain types of users can activate proposals.

accounts.name: locker
docs: The locker of the [Governor] that may activate the proposal.

instructions.name: cancelProposal
docs: This is only callable by the creator of the proposal.

instructions.name: queueProposal
docs: Queues a proposal for execution by the [SmartWallet].

accounts.name: transaction
docs: The transaction key of the proposal.
This account is passed to and validated by the Smart Wallet program to be initialized.

instructions.name: newVote
docs: Creates a new [Vote]. Anyone can call this.

instructions.name: setVote
docs: This may only be called by the [Governor::voter].

instructions.name: setGovernanceParams
docs: This may only be called by the [Governor::smart_wallet].

instructions.name: setVotingReward
docs: This may only be called by the [Governor::smart_wallet].

accounts.name: voter
docs: TODO: check whether vote delegrate can claim on behalf of owner?

accounts.name: governor
docs: A Governor is the DAO: it is the account that holds control over important protocol functions,
including treasury, protocol parameters, and more.

fields.name: locker
docs: The voting body associated with the Governor.
This account is responsible for handling vote proceedings, such as:
- setting the number of votes per voter

fields.name: smartWallet
docs: The public key of the [smart_wallet::SmartWallet] account.

fields.name: votingReward
docs: optional reward, can set by smartwallet

accounts.name: proposal
docs: A Yes/No Proposal is a pending transaction that may or may not be executed by the DAO.

fields.name: governor
docs: The public key of the governor.

fields.name: index
docs: The unique ID of the proposal, auto-incremented.

fields.name: proposer
docs: The public key of the proposer.

fields.name: quorumVotes
docs: The number of votes in support of a proposal required in order for a quorum to be reached and for a vote to succeed

fields.name: canceledAt
docs: The timestamp when the proposal was canceled.

fields.name: createdAt
docs: The timestamp when the proposal was created.

fields.name: activatedAt
docs: The timestamp in which the proposal was activated.

fields.name: votingEndsAt
docs: This only applies to active proposals.

fields.name: queuedAt
docs: The timestamp in which the proposal was queued, i.e.
approved for execution on the Smart Wallet.

fields.name: queuedTransaction
docs: If the transaction was queued, this is the associated Smart Wallet transaction.

fields.name: instructions
docs: The instructions associated with the proposal.

fields.name: descriptionLink
docs: Link to a description of the proposal.

accounts.name: vote
docs: A [Vote] is a vote made by a `voter`

fields.name: side
docs: The side of the vote taken.

fields.name: votingPower
docs: The number of votes this vote holds.

fields.name: claimed
docs: Flag to check whether voter has claim the reward or not

fields.name: votingDelay
docs: The delay before voting on a proposal may take place, once proposed, in seconds

fields.name: votingPeriod
docs: The duration of voting on a proposal, in seconds

fields.name: quorumVotes
docs: The number of votes in support of a proposal required in order for a quorum to be reached and for a vote to succeed

fields.name: timelockDelaySeconds
docs: The timelock delay of the DAO's created proposals.

fields.name: programId
docs: Pubkey of the instruction processor that executes this instruction

fields.name: keys
docs: Metadata for what accounts should be passed to the instruction processor

fields.name: data
docs: Opaque data passed to the instruction processor

types.name: ProposalAccountMeta
docs: Account metadata used to define Instructions

fields.name: isSigner
docs: True if an Instruction requires a Transaction signature matching `pubkey`.

fields.name: isWritable
docs: True if the `pubkey` can be loaded as a read-write account.

types.name: ProposalState
docs: The `expired` state from Compound is missing here, because the

errors.name: GovernorNotFound
errors.msg: The owner of the smart wallet doesn't match with current.

errors.name: VotingDelayNotMet
errors.msg: The proposal cannot be activated since it has not yet passed the voting delay.
